Text: Congratulations Herring CompanyRed Herring company On behalf of Red Herring magazine we congratulate you on being selected by the Red Herring editors as one of the top companies to watch for the year We are pleased to offer you the attached Red Herring logo to display on your site Feel free to place this logo on your Web site and let your customers know that your company has been distinguished as a Red Herring company To place the Herring tile on the site please use one of these options Post the attached tile on your site and link it the following url indexasplayoutspecialreportgenchannel docidrhspecialreportid OR Place the code below on your site where you would like the tile to appear It will automatically display the tile and link to the above url A href indexasplayoutspecialreportgenchannel docidrhspecialreportid img srcuploadimagesrhtilegif borderA If you decide to use this in press materials please use the following verbiage in reference to Red Herring Presenting the most important private and public companies in the world companies that despite the downturn are either disrupting existing markets or creating new ones altogether Each year since Red Herring editors select public and private companies they see as the brightest stars in the business universe the companies whose products services and business models define business innovation The Red Herring represents the future the latest trends the hottest sectors the leading markets It predicts the definitive companies the leaders of tomorrow Again we congratulate you and wish you success in your companys future endeavors Sincerely Red Herring Edit Staff If you have additional questions please contact Bernadette Santillan at mailto rhtilegif Bernadette Santillan Marketing Associate RedHerringcom p Red Herring Communications Bryant St Ste San Francisco CA wwwredherringcom rhtilegif
